name: df-eigvec
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cei, cmpt(s0, co(chba, cmap, chba), crab(s1, cdif(chba, c0h), wrex(s2, cc, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s2), csm, cv(s1)))))))
comment: Define the eigenvector function. Theorem ~ eleigveccl shows that ` eigvec `` T ` , the set of eigenvectors of Hilbert space operator ` T ` , are Hilbert space vectors. (Contributed by NM, 11-Mar-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
